data.prayer: Father, convict the 2,500 believers in Amnat Charoen to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amnat Charoen, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Amnat Charoen who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Amnat Charoen against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Amnat Charoen, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Iu Mien people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Amnat Charoen, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Amnat Charoen, Thailand today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Amnat Charoen, Thailand has a population of 386,700.

We estimate Amnat Charoen has 2,500 people who might know Jesus, 2,553 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 381,647 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Amnat Charoen, Thailand to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
